name: DiceVerse (gmtk game jam 2022)
description:
When he gets home, Max Power can only disconnect from the drudgery of routine by entering the DiceVerse and killing some robots.

Game created for the GMTK 2022 GameJam, whose theme was "Roll of the Dice".

This is our first game jam. Thanks for playing!

Game created by Tapauna (Programming) and Crowsler (Programming and Art).

The sounds are Creative Commons licensed:

Gameplay Music: https://freesound.org/people/Doctor_Dreamchip/sounds/511278/

Menu music: https://freesound.org/people/suchthefool88/sounds/344252/

Player effect: https://freesound.org/people/ani_music/sounds/219620/

Turret effect: https://opengameart.org/content/laser-weapon-burst-fire

Robot effect: https://opengameart.org/content/laser-rifle

Boss effect: https://opengameart.org/content/space-laser

Door effect: https://freesound.org/people/alexo400/sounds/543654/
